entry.title: Useful Total Scattering Data Processing Utilities

link.title: Useful Total Scattering Data Processing Utilities

entry.content:
We are announcing several useful implementations regarding the neutron powder total scattering data reduction and processing.

Main Features

  • User definition of sample and container geometry for absorption correction enabled in the Mantid framework
  • A chunk-by-chunk Fourier filter routine pystog_ck made available to general users on Analysis cluster. Detailed instructions can be found here.
  • A hydrogen background removal routine is available on Analysis through mts_data. Detailed instructions can be found here.
entry.summary: We are announcing several useful implementations regarding the neutron powder total scattering data reduction and processing.

entry.title: An Experiment Monitor on the Phone

entry.content:

entry.title: A Web-based Quick Data Plotter
entry.content:
Excited to announce the release of a data plotter in ADDIE, addie.ornl.gov/plotter.

Main Features

  • A data plotter accessible from anywhere on the web
  • Handling several tens of data files
  • Support up to 10 different folders selection of files
  • Quick comparison between two data sets
  • Robust handling of headers
  • Minimal user inputs
entry.summary: Excited to announce the release of a data plotter in ADDIE, addie.ornl.gov/plotter.

entry.title: HFIR Estimator Tool Available
entry.content:
Excited to announce the release of the HFIR estimator tool in ADDIE, addie.ornl.gov/hfirestimate

Main Feature

  • Simple input
  • Powder diffraction simulator with instrument effect
  • Estimation of the uncertainty level

Stay tuned for the paper regarding the tool.
